title: 客户端崩溃
author: 我叫aaaa9
txt_content: ---- Minecraft Crash Report ---- // Hi. I'm Minecraft, and I'm a crashaholic.  Time: 16-5-27 下午5:52 Description: Registering texture  java.lang.OutOfMemoryError: unable to create new native thread         at java.lang.Thread.start0(Native replies.author: 我叫aaaa9
replies.txt_content: 时不时的会闪屏，然后就掉线了

replies.author: 我叫aaaa9
replies.txt_content: 我今天才加的，前几天也会崩溃，不是编辑器的问题{:10_513:}

replies.author: 熊镔
replies.txt_content: registering texture加载材质包导致的崩溃

replies.author: Lucky_fish0w0
replies.txt_content: java.lang.OutOfMemoryError内存溢出，调整最大内存，调高一些，不要超过机子负担（32bit的java不能超过2048MB）；如果超过机子负担，试着调小一些
